title: 25 Jewelry Finds From Amazon That Look Exceptionally Luxe
description: Looking for a new piece of jewelry to add to your collection or gift to your best friend? What about a classic pair of hoop earrings to elevate an outfit? Or perhaps you prefer something more personalized, like an initial pendant necklace. No matter what you're looking for, we're willing to bet you can find it on Amazon, not to mention for a super-low price. The digital retailer has options from both affordable and designer jewelry brands (see: Swarovski and Tory Burch, among others), plus a mix of on-trend styles and timeless designs for everyone, regardless of taste. If you've landed here because you're looking for a specific piece of jewelry, we found options in all sorts of categories, from anklets to cute, affordable earrings. Two designs we encourage you to scope out? A rectangular-faced timepiece that Bachelor Nation alum Rachael Kirkconnell calls one of her "favorite watches ever," and the layered M Mooham Store Initial Necklace, which dresses up any outfit and looks luxe. Worth noting: both designs cost under $60 and have a cult following of shoppers who attest that they're great. What more could you ask for, really? If you want to check out the complete list, keep scrolling to see our 25 favorite Amazon jewelry finds for the season that are worth adding to your jewelry box stat.
author: Marisa Petrarca
excerpt: We rounded up the best Amazon jewelry to shop, including earrings, necklaces, rings, and more.
text: While each product featured is independently selected by our editors, we may include paid promotion. If you buy something through our links, we may earn commission. Read more about our Product Review Guidelines here.Looking for a new piece of jewelry to add to your collection or gift to your best friend? What about a classic pair of hoop earrings to elevate an outfit? Or perhaps you prefer something more personalized, like an initial pendant necklace. No matter what you're looking for, we're willing to bet you can find it on Amazon, not to mention for a super-low price. The digital retailer has options from both affordable and designer jewelry brands (see: Swarovski and Tory Burch, among others), plus a mix of on-trend styles and timeless designs for everyone, regardless of taste.If you've landed here because you're looking for a specific piece of jewelry, we found options in all sorts of categories, from anklets to cute, affordable earrings. Two designs we encourage you to scope out? A rectangular-faced timepiece that Bachelor Nation alum Rachael Kirkconnell calls one of her "favorite watches ever," and the layered M Mooham Store Initial Necklace, which dresses up any outfit and looks luxe. Worth noting: both designs cost under $60 and have a cult following of shoppers who attest that they're great. What more could you ask for, really?If you want to check out the complete list, keep scrolling to see our 25 favorite Amazon jewelry finds for the season that are worth adding to your jewelry box stat.amazon.comBest Large Hoop Earrings SetCuicanstar Hoop Earrings ($10) For larger and thinner hoops, try this set that comes in a variety of sizes and two metal tones. This is one of Amazon's bestsellers in hoop earrings, so it's a popular choice. The earrings are made from stainless steel and are hypoallergenic and gentle on sensitive ears.amazon.comBest Initial NecklaceQyalie Bubble Letter Necklace ($10, originally $14) Whether you gift this script-initial pendant necklace to a loved one or keep it for yourself, it has the potential to become a regular in anyone's accessory rotation. As a reminder, bubble necklaces are trending, so there's no better time to add one to your virtual shopping cart.amazon.comBest AnkletPAVOI 14K Gold Plated Charm Link Flat Gold Anklet ($12) As summer approaches and we transition from boots to sandals, it's the perfect time to add an anklet to your accessory lineup. This anklet boasts a delicate gold chain embellished with sparkling gemstones and comes with a two-inch extender clasp for a perfect fit.amazon.comBest Heart NecklaceTiny Gold Initial Heart Necklace ($13, originally $14) This delicate gold-plated engraved heart necklace looks expensive but isn't. Nearly 30,000 (!) people have rated it five stars. "I haven't taken this off for over a month & it still looks new!" one reviewer writes. "I have received many compliments."PS Photography | Marisa PetrarcaBest Waterdrop EarringsApsvo Chunky Gold Hoop Earrings ($13) If these waterdrop earrings look familiar, that might be because they're a TikTok-famous dupe for a $1,350 pair from a luxury fashion label. They look nearly identical to the real thing, affirmed by one of our editors who put them to the test. Learn more via our Apsvo Chunky Gold Hoop Earrings review.Editor Quote: "Having worn them to a fall wedding recently, I can confirm they're worth the hype. Not only do they look expensive, but the best thing about them is they're lightweight, which I found especially surprising given their chunky teardrop shape and substantial size. While wearing them, I don't even feel them in my earlobes, unlike others that I've owned that feel heavy and like they're pulling." — Marisa Petrarca, contributing editor, Shoppingamazon.comBest Tassel EarringsMe&Hz Colorful Layered Tassel Earrings ($13) Make a stylish statement with these playful tiered tassel earrings, which come in every color under the sun (plus a few patterns). Shoppers say they're lightweight and they garner compliments from strangers.amazon.comBest Crisscross RingPavoi 14K Gold Plated X Ring Simulated Diamond CZ Criss Cross Ring ($13-$38) This ring has so much to love, from its crisscross design to its dazzling gemstones. Despite its affordable price tag, shoppers are impressed by how long it lasts, even though it's costume jewelry. Multiple reviews note that it still looks new after wearing it "nonstop" for weeks.amazon.comBest Clover BraceletTicvrss Clover Lucky Bracelet ($13) This clover-shaped bracelet is Amazon's bestseller in the link bracelets category, and for good reason. It's plated in 18K gold and is adjustable so you can get the perfect fit. It comes in several color options with stones in white, black, red, and green.amazon.comBest 12-Piece Ring SetFaxhion 12PCS Gold Stackable Rings Set ($14) Buying one ring at a time is cool and all, but there's a strong case to be made for purchasing this set of 12 (!). It's perfect for those who are overwhelmed by the thought of curating a ring collection and would prefer to stockpile them all at once.amazon.comBest Bracelet SetDoubgood Gold Beaded Bracelets ($14, originally $16) This bracelet set is a fantastic deal, especially considering its sale price. The set includes four gold bracelets, namely two small beaded bracelets, one bigger beaded bracelet with an initial pendant, and one paperclip-link bracelet. One person who rated them five stars wrote: "I get compliments on these every time I wear them! They haven't turned my skin green, they don't pull those little arm hairs like a lot of stretchy bracelets do. They are sturdy and look expensive without paying the price of it."amazon.comBest Hoop EarringsPAVOI 14K Gold Plated Lightweight Chunky Open Hoops ($14-$69) If you prefer a single set of earrings over buying a set, meet your match. This pair takes the number one spot among all of Amazon's bestselling jewelry. They're thick yet lightweight and come in three gold-plated color options: gold, silver, and rose gold.amazon.comBest Paperclip EarringsPavoi 14K Gold Convertible Link Earrings ($14) These elongated paperclip earrings convert huggie hoops into dangling earrings. They're 22mm in length when linked together, so they're small enough to wear every day. You can choose between yellow gold, rose gold, and white gold.amazon.comBest Tiny Faux Diamond NecklaceTewiky Diamond Necklace ($14, originally $15) Prefer a layered necklace that's a bit more understated? Check out this one, featuring two chains, one with a tiny, sparkly gemstone. It exudes the sophistication of a luxury design but without the steep price tag.amazon.comBest Small Hoop Earrings SetRoseJeopal 14K Gold Plated Hoop Earrings — 4 Pairs ($15, originally $17) These gold-plated hoop earrings come in a set of four, which means they cost just $4 apiece. They're editor-approved and a hot commodity on Amazon with over 2,000 five star ratings. If gold isn't your metal of choice, they also come in silver and rose gold. Read more about them in our RoseJeopal 14K Gold Plated Hoop Earrings review.Editor Quote: "If you're a dancer or fitness instructor and looking for a cute pair of earrings that don't get in the way, I highly recommend this set. I did a full POPSUGAR Fitness dance cardio workout while wearing these hoops, and they stayed on the whole time. They're so lightweight that I forget I'm even wearing them." — Lilian Gonzalez, associate fitness producer amazon.comBest Layered NecklaceM Mooham Dainty Gold Necklace ($15) If you like the look of layered necklaces and aren't ready to splurge on an investment piece, consider this paperclip-chain design featuring a short paperclip chain necklace and a longer one with a large initial pendant. It comes in three colors: gold, silver, and rose gold.amazon.comBest Beaded BraceletLittle Words Project Beaded Bracelet ($28) These bracelets serve as daily affirmations and make the most meaningful gifts. You can choose between eight different designs with varying colors and words, so you can pick the one that speaks to you. The company is woman-founded and community-focused.amazon.comBest WatchBERNY Gold Watch ($57, originally $60) Rachael Kirkconnell generously revealed some of her Amazon favorites in conversation with PS, and this chic gold timepiece made the list. (She called it one of her "favorite watches ever.") She's not alone; hundreds more Amazon shoppers love its luxurious look. Read her full list of favorites in our interview with the Bachelor Nation star.amazon.comBest 3-Piece Ring SetGorjana Amara Ring Set ($60-$70) This ring set is one of the brand's bestselling curations. A fun tidbit: it's inspired by "Schitt's Creek"'s David Rose, particularly his signature set of cuff rings. The set comes with three different-size bands: 1/16, 1/8, and 1/4 inches wide.PS Photography | Marisa PetrarcaBest Pendant NecklaceKendra Scott Elisa Pendant Necklace ($62, originally $73) This necklace is Kendra Scott's number-one bestseller and has been since 2015. It's so popular that one sells per minute, according to the brand. It features an adjustable length so you can find your ideal fit. You can choose a gold or silver chain and your favorite stone pendant from over 30 options. Learn more about it by reading our Kendra Scott Elisa Pendant Necklace review.Editor Quote: "I've found that it looks good with everything. I've worn it with casual everyday attire like a long-sleeve turtleneck or a T-shirt, and dressier ensembles as well. While I haven't delved into my jewelry box to explore potential layering options, I've been inspired by the various combinations showcased on the Kendra Scott Instagram page." — MPamazon.comBest Double-Knot EarringsHeaven Mayhem Women's Double Knot Earrings ($88, originally $110) Consider these earrings (and a few from earlier slides) proof that Amazon carries designer jewelry, too, perfect for those who prefer pieces built to last. This pair has been all over our TikTok feeds, and it's a metal-mixer's dream.Marisa Petrarca (she/her) is a contributing editor for PS Shopping and has over seven years of experience writing and editing beauty, fashion, and lifestyle content. She was previously the senior beauty editor at Grazia USA and the style and beauty editor at Us Weekly. Now freelancing, her work has been featured in Cosmopolitan, Allure, Marie Claire, and more. When she's not working on a story, you can probably find her testing the latest makeup, skin-care, or hair launches. Marisa lives in Saint Paul, MN, with her husband and their corgi, Cooper.
html:
While each product featured is independently selected by our editors, we may include paid promotion. If you buy something through our links, we may earn commission. Read more about our Product Review Guidelines here.

Looking for a new piece of jewelry to add to your collection or gift to your best friend? What about a classic pair of hoop earrings to elevate an outfit? Or perhaps you prefer something more personalized, like an initial pendant necklace. No matter what you're looking for, we're willing to bet you can find it on Amazon, not to mention for a super-low price. The digital retailer has options from both affordable and designer jewelry brands (see: Swarovski and Tory Burch, among others), plus a mix of on-trend styles and timeless designs for everyone, regardless of taste.

If you've landed here because you're looking for a specific piece of jewelry, we found options in all sorts of categories, from anklets to cute, affordable earrings. Two designs we encourage you to scope out? A rectangular-faced timepiece that Bachelor Nation alum Rachael Kirkconnell calls one of her "favorite watches ever," and the layered M Mooham Store Initial Necklace, which dresses up any outfit and looks luxe. Worth noting: both designs cost under $60 and have a cult following of shoppers who attest that they're great. What more could you ask for, really?

If you want to check out the complete list, keep scrolling to see our 25 favorite Amazon jewelry finds for the season that are worth adding to your jewelry box stat.

Best Large Hoop Earrings Set

Cuicanstar Hoop Earrings ($10)

For larger and thinner hoops, try this set that comes in a variety of sizes and two metal tones. This is one of Amazon's bestsellers in hoop earrings, so it's a popular choice. The earrings are made from stainless steel and are hypoallergenic and gentle on sensitive ears.

Best Initial Necklace

Qyalie Bubble Letter Necklace ($10, originally $14)

Whether you gift this script-initial pendant necklace to a loved one or keep it for yourself, it has the potential to become a regular in anyone's accessory rotation. As a reminder, bubble necklaces are trending, so there's no better time to add one to your virtual shopping cart.

Best Anklet

PAVOI 14K Gold Plated Charm Link Flat Gold Anklet ($12)

As summer approaches and we transition from boots to sandals, it's the perfect time to add an anklet to your accessory lineup. This anklet boasts a delicate gold chain embellished with sparkling gemstones and comes with a two-inch extender clasp for a perfect fit.

Best Heart Necklace

Tiny Gold Initial Heart Necklace ($13, originally $14)

This delicate gold-plated engraved heart necklace looks expensive but isn't. Nearly 30,000 (!) people have rated it five stars. "I haven't taken this off for over a month & it still looks new!" one reviewer writes. "I have received many compliments."

Best Waterdrop Earrings

Apsvo Chunky Gold Hoop Earrings ($13)

If these waterdrop earrings look familiar, that might be because they're a TikTok-famous dupe for a $1,350 pair from a luxury fashion label. They look nearly identical to the real thing, affirmed by one of our editors who put them to the test. Learn more via our Apsvo Chunky Gold Hoop Earrings review.

Editor Quote: "Having worn them to a fall wedding recently, I can confirm they're worth the hype. Not only do they look expensive, but the best thing about them is they're lightweight, which I found especially surprising given their chunky teardrop shape and substantial size. While wearing them, I don't even feel them in my earlobes, unlike others that I've owned that feel heavy and like they're pulling." — Marisa Petrarca, contributing editor, Shopping

Best Tassel Earrings

Me&Hz Colorful Layered Tassel Earrings ($13)

Make a stylish statement with these playful tiered tassel earrings, which come in every color under the sun (plus a few patterns). Shoppers say they're lightweight and they garner compliments from strangers.

Best Crisscross Ring

Pavoi 14K Gold Plated X Ring Simulated Diamond CZ Criss Cross Ring ($13-$38)

This ring has so much to love, from its crisscross design to its dazzling gemstones. Despite its affordable price tag, shoppers are impressed by how long it lasts, even though it's costume jewelry. Multiple reviews note that it still looks new after wearing it "nonstop" for weeks.

Best Clover Bracelet

Ticvrss Clover Lucky Bracelet ($13)

This clover-shaped bracelet is Amazon's bestseller in the link bracelets category, and for good reason. It's plated in 18K gold and is adjustable so you can get the perfect fit. It comes in several color options with stones in white, black, red, and green.

Best 12-Piece Ring Set

Faxhion 12PCS Gold Stackable Rings Set ($14)

Buying one ring at a time is cool and all, but there's a strong case to be made for purchasing this set of 12 (!). It's perfect for those who are overwhelmed by the thought of curating a ring collection and would prefer to stockpile them all at once.

Best Bracelet Set

Doubgood Gold Beaded Bracelets ($14, originally $16)

This bracelet set is a fantastic deal, especially considering its sale price. The set includes four gold bracelets, namely two small beaded bracelets, one bigger beaded bracelet with an initial pendant, and one paperclip-link bracelet. One person who rated them five stars wrote: "I get compliments on these every time I wear them! They haven't turned my skin green, they don't pull those little arm hairs like a lot of stretchy bracelets do. They are sturdy and look expensive without paying the price of it."

Best Hoop Earrings

PAVOI 14K Gold Plated Lightweight Chunky Open Hoops ($14-$69)

If you prefer a single set of earrings over buying a set, meet your match. This pair takes the number one spot among all of Amazon's bestselling jewelry. They're thick yet lightweight and come in three gold-plated color options: gold, silver, and rose gold.

Best Paperclip Earrings

Pavoi 14K Gold Convertible Link Earrings ($14)

These elongated paperclip earrings convert huggie hoops into dangling earrings. They're 22mm in length when linked together, so they're small enough to wear every day. You can choose between yellow gold, rose gold, and white gold.

Best Tiny Faux Diamond Necklace

Tewiky Diamond Necklace ($14, originally $15)

Prefer a layered necklace that's a bit more understated? Check out this one, featuring two chains, one with a tiny, sparkly gemstone. It exudes the sophistication of a luxury design but without the steep price tag.

Best Small Hoop Earrings Set

RoseJeopal 14K Gold Plated Hoop Earrings — 4 Pairs ($15, originally $17)

These gold-plated hoop earrings come in a set of four, which means they cost just $4 apiece. They're editor-approved and a hot commodity on Amazon with over 2,000 five star ratings. If gold isn't your metal of choice, they also come in silver and rose gold. Read more about them in our RoseJeopal 14K Gold Plated Hoop Earrings review.

Editor Quote: "If you're a dancer or fitness instructor and looking for a cute pair of earrings that don't get in the way, I highly recommend this set. I did a full POPSUGAR Fitness dance cardio workout while wearing these hoops, and they stayed on the whole time. They're so lightweight that I forget I'm even wearing them." — Lilian Gonzalez, associate fitness producer

Best Layered Necklace

M Mooham Dainty Gold Necklace ($15)

If you like the look of layered necklaces and aren't ready to splurge on an investment piece, consider this paperclip-chain design featuring a short paperclip chain necklace and a longer one with a large initial pendant. It comes in three colors: gold, silver, and rose gold.

Best Beaded Bracelet

Little Words Project Beaded Bracelet ($28)

These bracelets serve as daily affirmations and make the most meaningful gifts. You can choose between eight different designs with varying colors and words, so you can pick the one that speaks to you. The company is woman-founded and community-focused.

Best Watch

BERNY Gold Watch ($57, originally $60)

Rachael Kirkconnell generously revealed some of her Amazon favorites in conversation with PS, and this chic gold timepiece made the list. (She called it one of her "favorite watches ever.") She's not alone; hundreds more Amazon shoppers love its luxurious look. Read her full list of favorites in our interview with the Bachelor Nation star.

Best 3-Piece Ring Set

Gorjana Amara Ring Set ($60-$70)

This ring set is one of the brand's bestselling curations. A fun tidbit: it's inspired by "Schitt's Creek"'s David Rose, particularly his signature set of cuff rings. The set comes with three different-size bands: 1/16, 1/8, and 1/4 inches wide.

Best Pendant Necklace

Kendra Scott Elisa Pendant Necklace ($62, originally $73)

This necklace is Kendra Scott's number-one bestseller and has been since 2015. It's so popular that one sells per minute, according to the brand. It features an adjustable length so you can find your ideal fit. You can choose a gold or silver chain and your favorite stone pendant from over 30 options. Learn more about it by reading our Kendra Scott Elisa Pendant Necklace review.

Editor Quote: "I've found that it looks good with everything. I've worn it with casual everyday attire like a long-sleeve turtleneck or a T-shirt, and dressier ensembles as well. While I haven't delved into my jewelry box to explore potential layering options, I've been inspired by the various combinations showcased on the Kendra Scott Instagram page." — MP

Best Double-Knot Earrings

Heaven Mayhem Women's Double Knot Earrings ($88, originally $110)

Consider these earrings (and a few from earlier slides) proof that Amazon carries designer jewelry, too, perfect for those who prefer pieces built to last. This pair has been all over our TikTok feeds, and it's a metal-mixer's dream.

Marisa Petrarca (she/her) is a contributing editor for PS Shopping and has over seven years of experience writing and editing beauty, fashion, and lifestyle content. She was previously the senior beauty editor at Grazia USA and the style and beauty editor at Us Weekly. Now freelancing, her work has been featured in Cosmopolitan, Allure, Marie Claire, and more. When she's not working on a story, you can probably find her testing the latest makeup, skin-care, or hair launches. Marisa lives in Saint Paul, MN, with her husband and their corgi, Cooper.
